email_from_address.description:i18n: Plone generates email using this address as the email return address. It is also used as the destination address for the site-wide contact form and the “Send test email” feature.

email_from_name.description:i18n: Plone generates email using this name as the email sender.

host.description:i18n: The address of your local SMTP (outgoing email) server. Usually 'localhost', unless you use an external server to send email.

pass.description:i18n: The password for the ESMTP user account.

port.description:i18n: The port of your local SMTP (outgoing email) server. Usually '25'.

user.description:i18n: Username for authentication to your email server. Not required unless you are using ESMTP.

debug.description:i18n: If enabled, the mail is sent to a test server.

secure.description:i18n: If enabled, the mail is sent using a secure connection.
